trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZD102_05101_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Liinel Ja would like to ask a favor of you.
TEXT_KINGZD102_05101_TODO_00<tab>Search for and obtain Jayunja butterflies.
TEXT_KINGZD102_05101_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the Jayunja butterflies to Liinel Ja.
TEXT_KINGZD102_05101_LIINELJA_000_000<tab>Oh, how fortuitous that we should meet! For you, who have heralded the winds of change for all Mamook, I have a favor to ask.
TEXT_KINGZD102_05101_LIINELJA_000_001<tab>There are butterflies near Cenote Jayunja that glow a soft blue. Not the giant beasts, but rather small flittering creatures. Swift and clever.
TEXT_KINGZD102_05101_LIINELJA_000_002<tab>Catching them may prove more taxing than you anticipate, but I would be eternally grateful if you could bring me three.
TEXT_KINGZD102_05101_LIINELJA_000_003<tab>Would you be so kind as to catch me three butterflies from Cenote Jayunja? The small ones, mind─not the larger beasts.
TEXT_KINGZD102_05101_LIINELJA_000_004<tab>Were you able to find the butterflies?
TEXT_KINGZD102_05101_LIINELJA_000_005<tab>The very ones! We release a flutter of these during the exchange of matrimonial vows, to celebrate a couple's new journey together.
TEXT_KINGZD102_05101_LIINELJA_000_006<tab>Cenote Jayunja in particular is regarded as sacred. The butterflies that live there are thus prized above all for such ceremonies.

TEXT_KINGZD102_05101_LIINELJA_000_007<tab>They say the contrasting wings, when pressed together in rest, embody the joining of two lovers from different clans, and the everlasting devotion between them.
TEXT_KINGZD102_05101_LIINELJA_000_008<tab>No symbol could be more auspicious, especially when delivered by the hands that have borne new possibility to our city.
TEXT_KINGZD102_05101_LIINELJA_000_009<tab>You and the Third Promise have done more for us than you will ever know. These butterflies are sure to bring every happiness to the couple they bless.
